#summary Declaration of interface methods.
<wiki:toc max_depth="3"/>

= Interface method declaration =
The syntax to declare a method in an interface is specified by:
<blockquote><em>
interface-method-declaration:
    attributes<sub>opt</sub> return-type identifier type-parameter-list<sub>opt</sub> ( formal-parameter-list<sub>opt</sub> )
        type-parameter-constraints-clauses<sub>opt</sub> ;
</em></blockquote>
The method is implicitly {{{public}}} and {{{abstract}}}.
